entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 3:30 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 20.9 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: W 41 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming north 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
